description: Irregular triangular array T read by rows: T(i,0)=1 for i >= 0, T[1,1] = 1, T(1,2) = 1, T(2,1) = 1, T(2,2) = 1, T(3,1) = 2, T(3,2) = 2, T(3,3) = 2; and for i >= 4, T(i,1) = i-1, T(i,i) = T(i-1,i-2) + T(i-1,i-1) and T(i,j) = T(i-1,j-2) + T(i-1,j-1 )+ T(i-1,j) for j=2..i-1.
comments: a(n) = number of strings s(0)..s(n) such that s(n) = n-k, where s(0) = 0, s(1) = 1, |s(i)-s(i-1)| <= 1 for i >= 2; |s(2)-s(1)| = 1, and |s(3)-s(2)| = 1 if s(2) = 1.
